memberdef.argsstring: (const QString &fontFamily=DEFAULT_FONTMARKER_FONT, QChar chr=DEFAULT_FONTMARKER_CHR, double pointSize=DEFAULT_FONTMARKER_SIZE, const QColor &color=DEFAULT_FONTMARKER_COLOR, double angle=DEFAULT_FONTMARKER_ANGLE)
memberdef.name: QgsFontMarkerSymbolLayer

briefdescription.para: Returns the approximate bounding box of the marker symbol layer, taking into account any data defined overrides and offsets which are set for the marker layer.

simplesect.para: approximate symbol bounds, in painter units

briefdescription.para: Returns the character used when rendering points.
Shall be reimplemented by subclasses to create a deep copy of the instance.
Returns the font family name for the associated font which will be used to render the point.
Returns a string that represents this layer type.

detaileddescription.para: Used for serialization. Should match with the string used to register this symbol layer in the registry.

briefdescription.para: Returns the stroke join style.
Should be reimplemented by subclasses to return a string map that contains the configuration information for the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to serialize a symbol layer perstistently.

briefdescription.para: Renders a marker at the specified point.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must implement this to handle drawing the point.
point
position at which to render point, in painter units
context
symbol render context

briefdescription.para: Sets the character used when rendering points.
Sets the font family for the font which will be used to render the point.
Sets the stroke join style.
Set stroke color.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported by marker and fill layers.
QGIS 2.1

briefdescription.para: Set's the marker's stroke width.
Sets the stroke width map unit scale.
Sets the stroke width unit.
Gets stroke color.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported by marker and fill layers.
QGIS 2.1

briefdescription.para: Returns the marker's stroke width.
Returns the stroke width map unit scale.
Returns the stroke width unit.
Writes the symbol layer definition as a SLD XML element.
Creates a new QgsFontMarkerSymbolLayer from a property map (see properties())
Creates a new QgsFontMarkerSymbolLayer from an SLD XML element.

memberdef.argsstring: (QgsSymbolRenderContext &context, double scaledSize, bool &hasDataDefinedRotation, QPointF &offset, double &angle) const
